articles.content:
Cardi B and Offset rang in the new year together amid their ongoing relationship drama.

articles.title: Froggy Carr Mummers' Trump flag leads to fight at 2024 parade - The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.description: Froggy Carr, founded in the early 1970s, was disqualified from the 2020 Mummers parade after two members wore blackface.
articles.content: At the 2024 Mummers Parade, alongside extravagant performances and delighted onlookers, a small scuffle broke out between marchers with the Froggy Carr Wench Brigade and a group of spectators over a … [+2369 chars]
